data.description:
Improve VR, the cutting-edge cognitive training app designed to boost your mental abilities through immersive and personalized scenarios. With Improve VR, you can train and improve your cognitive skills effectively and enjoyably.

Key Features:
- Analyzed Cognitive Skills: You will be able to train and develop your cognitive potential and monitor the progress of cognitive abilities such as inhibitory response, attention, reaction time in simple and complex environments, quantitative and qualitative motor accuracy, reaction time and accuracy across the five channels of the visual field, and much more.
- Custom Scenarios: Train with virtual scenarios tailored to challenge and improve specific cognitive skills such as memory, attention, problem-solving, and more.
- Advanced Monitoring: Track your progress with the analytics area. This section gathers detailed data on your performance, presenting your cognitive abilities in numbers and percentages.
- Immediate Feedback: Receive instant feedback on your training sessions to better understand your strengths and areas for improvement.
- Session-by-Session Progress: Monitor your progress session by session to see how your cognitive abilities evolve over time.
